description: Alter surface fluxes to impose model climatology plus positive Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV) anomalies of Sea Surface Temperature (SST) over the extra-tropical north Atlantic (30N-65N).  Idealised AMV anomalies of SST will be provided by DCPP.  For groups that are unable to restore SSTs.
name: Impose SST AMV pos extra tropical N Atlantic
rationale: To investigate the climate impacts of positive Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV) anomalies.
longName: Impose positive AMV anomaly to sea surface temperatures in the extra-tropical north Atlantic
keywords: DCPP, SST, imposed, AMV+, positive AMV, positive Atlantic Multidecadal Variability anomaly, extra-tropical north Atlantic
